description: Blackmail is a Tamil crime thriller that has finally made its way to the OTT. The movie follows the lives of three individuals entangled in a web of crime and deception.
title: Blackmail Now Streaming Online: Know Where to Watch This Tamil Crime Thriller Movie

description: Canva has unveiled Video 2.0, its first native AI model, and Canva Grow, a full-scale marketing platform, as part of a major update to its Visual Suite. The Sydney-based firm also added Ask Canva, Email Design, and Forms tools, enhancing usability for its 260 million monthly users while positioning itself as an all-in-one creative operating system.
title: Canva Introduces Revamped Video Editor, New AI Tools and a Marketing Platform

description: Eva Husson’s Playdate is an intense mystery drama premiering on Prime Video, exploring how a seemingly innocent playdate between children unravels into chaos, secrets, and emotional conflict. It features Jenna Coleman and Matthew Goode in a suspenseful, emotional drama.
title: Eva Husson’s Playdate OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Raj Tarun returns with Chiranjeeva, a fun fantasy-comedy premiering on Aha on November 7, 2025. The film follows Shiva, a carefree driver whose life turns wild when he gains the power to see people’s lifespans. With humour, emotion and a supernatural twist, this debut directorial from Abhinaya Krishna promises a feel-good OTT entertainer.
title: Raj Tarun's Chiranjeeva OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Scientists using the Daniel K. Inouye Solar Telescope have detected Alfvén waves in the Sun’s corona, potentially solving the long-standing mystery of its extreme heat and helping refine models of solar and stellar energy transfer.
title: Scientists May Have Finally Solved the Sun’s Mysteriously Hot Atmosphere Puzzle

description: Thode Door Thode Paas is an upcoming web series that will soon be available on Zee 5. The series is a family drama and stars Pankaj Kapoor in the key role.
title: Thode Door Thode Paas OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Vivo X300 Pro was launched globally on Thursday, alongside the vanilla Vivo X300. Both handsets are powered by the recently unveiled 3nm octa core MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset. While the Vivo X300 features a 200-megapixel primary rear camera, the Pro model gets a 200-megapixel periscope telephoto camera. The standard model sports a smaller AMOLED display and weighs about 190g. Meanwhile, the Vivo X300 Pro is heavier, weighing around 226g. The Pro model also sports a 6.78-inch AMOLED screen.
title: Vivo X300 Series Launched Globally With 200-Megapixel Zeiss Camera, Up to 6.78-Inch Display: Price, Features

description: As Hurricane Melissa devastates parts of the Caribbean, Jamaica has witnessed a sharp rise in downloads of Jack Dorsey’s BitChat app. The decentralised platform enables offline, encrypted communication through Bluetooth mesh networks, providing a vital tool for residents facing power and internet outages. BitChat’s growing popularity underscores how blockchain-driven systems can serve as dependable alternatives during large-scale disruptions.
title: Bitchat Becomes Jamaica’s Go-to App as Hurricane Melissa Cripples Communication

description: Google Maps appears to be developing a new mode that will reduce battery usage during navigation. Reference to the feature was reportedly spotted on the APK teardown of Google Maps for Android. Users may also be able to activate the Power Saving mode directly within the Google Maps app. The UI may show a monochrome design in this mode, leaving only the most essential navigation elements visible.
title: Google Maps Is Reportedly Developing a New Power Saving Mode for Navigation

description: If you're looking for great offline Android games in 2025, here's a list of 20 of the best titles across action, RPG, puzzle, and racing genres. From roguelike hits like Dead Cells and Grimvalor to relaxing adventures like Alto’s Odyssey and strategic gems like Mini Metro, these games deliver console-quality visuals, deep gameplay, and lasting replay value, all without Wi-Fi. Whether you enjoy story-driven RPGs, tactical puzzles, or high-speed races, each game ensures engaging entertainment anytime, anywhere.
title: Top 20 Offline Android Games in 2025: Best RPG, Action, Puzzle Titles and More

description: Reliance and Google have teamed up to offer Jio users free access to Google AI Pro for 18 months, a deal valued at Rs. 35,100. Eligible users aged 18–25 on Jio’s unlimited 5G plans can access premium AI models like Gemini 2.5 Pro and Veo 3.1 Fast, along with 2TB cloud storage and AI features in Google Workspace apps.
title: How to Claim 18 Months of Free Google AI Pro Access on the MyJio App

description: Instagram Lite, first released in 2020, was taken down by Meta soon after its launch, only to be relaunched later in March 2021 in 107 countries. The 'Lite' version of Instagram was aiming to serve people who live in regions with poor internet connectivity, as it can render content even on a 2G connection. Moreover, it occupies significantly less space on your phone. However, it is only available on Android phones and lacks a few features when compared to Instagram.
title: Instagram Lite vs Instagram: Differences Explained

description: Take-Two CEO Strauss Zelnick has said that AI won't be able to create a game like Grand Theft Auto, and even if it could, it won't be "very good". The Take-Two boss said AI lacked creativity and hence could not create complex universes of video games.
title: Take-Two CEO Says AI Won't Be 'Very Good' at Making a Game Like Grand Theft Auto

description: Experience Hedda (2025), a gripping psychological drama blending classic literature with modern sensibilities, now available on Prime Video. It focuses on the luxurious lifestyle and a woman feel trapped in the conservative lifestyle.
title: Hedda (2025) Now Available for Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know

description: Google Maps allows users to mark exact locations on the map. This feature can be used on Google Maps on Android, iPhone, and desktop. The feature allows users to share the pin with their recent apps or contacts. Here is how to use the drop pin feature across all platforms.
title: How to Drop a Pin in Google Maps on Mobile and Desktop: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: iQOO Neo 11 has been launched in China in two colour options on Thursday. It runs on the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. It houses a 7,500mAh battery.
title: iQOO Neo 11 With 7,500mAh Battery, Snapdragon 8 Elite Chip Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Meta posted $56 billion in revenue for Q3 2025, up 26 percent year-over-year, but its Reality Labs division recorded a $4.4 billion loss, despite strong AI glasses sales. The unit, which handles Quest headsets and AR glasses, has now amassed over $70 billion in total losses since 2020, underscoring Meta’s continued struggle to make its metaverse ambitions profitable.
title: Meta’s VR Headsets and AI Glasses Cost the Company $4.4 Billion in Q3 2025

description: Google and Reliance announced a strategic partnership on Thursday. As part of the partnership, the Jio users will able to avail 18 months of free Google's AI Pro plan worth Rs. 35,100.
title: Reliance Jio Users to Get Free Google AI Pro Access for 18 Months Worth Rs. 35,100 With Gemini, Veo Features

description: Samsung has confirmed key details about the upcoming Galaxy S26 series during its Q3 2025 earnings call, revealing major upgrades in AI, performance, and camera technology. The lineup is expected to feature a new custom chipset, likely the 2nm Exynos 2600, alongside Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 in select regions. Samsung also hinted at possible price hikes due to rising component costs and announced plans to expand its foldable phones, Galaxy Watches, and wireless earbuds in 2026.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Teased to Launch With Upgraded Chipset, Camera, and AI Features

description: Telegram founder Pavel Durov has announced Cocoon, a decentralised AI network built on The Open Network (TON). The platform allows users to earn Toncoin by sharing GPU power while maintaining control of their personal data. Cocoon’s launch highlights Durov’s push for privacy-driven AI innovation and builds on Telegram’s growing Web3 ecosystem.
title: Telegram Founder Pavel Durov Launches Cocoon, a Decentralised AI Project on TON

description: Bitcoin’s price dropped below the $110,000 (roughly Rs. 97.4 lakh) mark after the US Federal Reserve cut interest rates by 25 basis points. Although expected, the announcement of quantitative easing from December shook short-term sentiment, leading to over $700 million (roughly Rs. 6,200 crore) in liquidations.
title: Bitcoin’s Price Continues to Fall as Markets React to US Fed Rate Cut

description: Starting October 29, Google can no longer restrict the use of alternative payment systems in the US Play Store. Also, the tech giant can not force the developers to use Google Play Billing for payments. The latest update is in line with an injunction resulting from the Epic vs. Google case. Google has listed out the changes being made today on this webpage. Additionally, developers are now allowed to provide direct links for downloading apps.
title: Google Brings Major Changes to Play Store Operations in the US After Epic Games Ruling

description: Google has crossed a major financial milestone, posting $102.3 billion in revenue for Q3 2025, its first-ever quarter above the $100 billion mark. CEO Sundar Pichai credited the growth to Google’s “full-stack AI approach”, spanning infrastructure, models, and products. Alphabet’s revenue grew 16 percent YoY, with strong gains across Search, YouTube, Cloud, and subscriptions.
title: Google’s AI Bet Pays Off With Its First-Ever $100 Billion Quarter

description: Google Chrome and Firefox allow users to clear cache and web cookies, apart from deleting their entire web histories. When you're surfing the internet, your browser, like the two mentioned, collects data from various websites and stores the same as cookies and cache. This allows it to offer a smooth experience when you visit the website again. However, this can also slow down the browser when it reaches capacity. To resolve this issue, you can clear cache and cookies.
title: How to Clear Cache in Google Chrome, Firefox on Android, iPhone

description: Lava has begun teasing the India launch of the Lava Agni 4, confirmed to debut in November. The latest teaser highlights a metal build with metallic-finish buttons, marking a design upgrade from previous models. Leaks suggest the smartphone will feature a 6.78-inch full-HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a 4nm MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset, UFS 4.0 inbuilt storage, and a battery of over 7,000mAh capacity. Expected to be priced around Rs. 25,000, the Agni 4 will succeed the Lava Agni 3, which features a secondary AMOLED screen at the back.
title: Lava Agni 4 Teased to Feature Metal Design and Flat Edges, Could Launch in India Soon

description: ChatGPT maker OpenAI is laying the groundwork for what could be one of the biggest IPOs of all time. The company is considering filing with securities regulators as soon as the second half of 2026, some of the people said. In preliminary discussions, the company has looked at raising $60 billion at the low end and likely more, the people said.
title: OpenAI Lays Groundwork for Juggernaut IPO at Up to $1 Trillion Valuation

description: Realme GT 8 Pro is now confirmed to launch in India next month. The flagship handset will be powered by Qualcomm's 3nm octa core Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, coupled with a HyperVision AI chip. It is also confirmed to carry a Ricoh GR-tuned rear camera setup. These specifications are similar to its Chinese counterpart. The Realme GT 8 Pro recently debuted in China on October 21 with 7,000mAh battery, alongside the standard Realme GT 8.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Confirmed to Launch in India in November; Will Go on Sale via Flipkart

description: Samsung has announced new updates to its Samsung Wallet in India. Now, the platform allows users to set up Unified Payments Interface (UPI) during the initial setup of their new Galaxy device. It also brings biometric authentication, eliminating the need for a PIN. The update brings improved Tap and Pay support in the country. The digital wallet now supports direct online usage of stored credit and debit cards at select merchant checkouts.
title: Samsung Wallet Updated With UPI Onboarding and Support for Biometric Payments

description: Qualcomm is rumoured to be developing a new chipset that could join the recently introduced 8 Elite Gen 5. As per a tipster, the unannounced Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 could feature a design blueprint identical to the flagship SoC. It is said to be fabricated based on TSMC’s N3p process. Tipster suggests OEMs such as iQOO, Motorola, Meizu, and Vivo could use the unannounced SoC in their upcoming smartphones.
title: Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chipset Key Specifications and Benchmark Scores Tipped; May Power Upcoming iQOO, Vivo Phones

description: The top OTT platforms are all set with new releases, where some of the most anticipated movies and series like The Witcher, Kantara, Lokah, and more, are launching on your digital screens.
title: Top OTT Releases of the Week (Oct 27- Nov 2): Kantara: Chapter 1, Lokah Chapter 1, Idli Kadai, The Witcher Season 4, and More

description: Google started the early access rollout of the Gemini for Home voice assistant in the US. It will be expanded to more countries next year. The Gemini for Home will replace the Google Assistant on the Nest smart home devices. The voice assistant will support all Google speakers and displays released since 2016. Users need a Google Home Premium subscription to access advanced features, including Gemini Live.
title: Gemini for Home Voice Assistant Early Access Rollout Begins: Check Compatible Speakers, Displays

description: Gemini 3 artificial intelligence (AI) model will be released later this year, confirmed Google CEO Sundar Pichai on Wednesday. The confirmation came during his Q3 2025 earnings call, where the main highlight was the company hitting the milestone of $102.3 billion (roughly Rs. 9.06 lakh crore) in revenue in the quarter.
title: Google Confirms Gemini 3 AI Model Release Timeline: Tipped to Offer Improved Reasoning

description: Grammarly has officially rebranded as Superhuman, consolidating its portfolio under one name. The new Superhuman brand now includes Grammarly, Coda, Superhuman Mail, and the newly launched Superhuman Go, an agentic AI assistant that proactively connects to user data across apps like Google Workspace and Outlook to assist with tasks and writing without prompts.
title: Grammarly Rebrands to Superhuman, Introduces New Agentic AI Assistant

description: Converting Excel files to PDF ensures your data looks consistent and professional across all devices. You can easily do this using several methods, like copying your Excel data into Microsoft Word and saving it as a PDF, using online converters like Smallpdf or iLovePDF for quick results, relying on Adobe Acrobat PDF Maker for precise formatting, or exporting directly through Google Drive for collaborative work. Each method keeps your spreadsheet clean, secure, and ready to share without formatting issues.
title: How to Convert Excel Files to PDF: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Microsoft on Thursday announced that its Azure services have been restored to almost normality across affected regions. The cloud computing platform was reported to be experiencing a major global outage on Wednesday, affecting not only Microsoft-owned platforms like Microsoft 365, Minecraft, Outlook, and Xbox Live, but also Alaska Airlines, Starbucks, and other services. The Redmond-based tech giant said that it impacted services leveraging Azure Front Door (AFD), its modern cloud content delivery network (CDN).
title: Microsoft Azure Services Restored After Global Outage: What Caused the Issue, How It Was Resolved

description: Microsoft, in January, announced that it will be investing $3 billion (roughly Rs. 26,542 crore) in India to expand its cloud computing and artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities. The announcement was made by the tech giant's Indian-origin CEO, Satya Nadella, at an event in Bengaluru. Now, Nadella is reportedly planning to visit India again in December to attend two conferences on AI and meet Indian government officials. He is said to visit Mumbai, Bengaluru, and New Delhi. This comes as more tech firms show interest in India's burgeoning demand for AI tools.
title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella Will Reportedly Visit India in December; Could Address Two AI Conferences

description: Sony has announced the games coming to PS Plus Essential tier in November. These include cat simulator adventure title Stray, rally racing sim WRC 24, and physics-based battle sim Totally Accurate Battle Simulator.
title: PS Plus Monthly Games for November Include Stray, EA Sports WRC 24 and Totally Accurate Battle Simulator

description: The Vivo S50 Pro Mini is expected to be introduced in China as the successor to the S30 Pro Mini. Ahead of its anticipated debut, a tipster has highlighted key specifications of the purported handset. It is tipped to be powered by the unannounced Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC. The Vivo S50 Pro Mini could feature a periscope telephoto lens and a battery bigger than the unit on the Vivo X300. The handset may debut globally as the Vivo X300 FE.
title: Vivo S50 Pro Mini Key Specifications Tipped Ahead of China Launch; Could Debut Globally as Vivo X300 FE

description: Instagram is testing a new “Your Algorithm” feature that lets users personalise their feeds by adding or removing topics of interest, starting with Reels and later expanding to Explore. Announced by CEO Adam Mosseri, the tool summarises user engagement patterns and allows further topic adjustments via an Add+ option. The update aims to give users more control over their content experience, aligning with Meta’s push for transparency and customisation across its platforms, including future plans for Threads.
title: Instagram Tests New Feature That Lets Users Customise Their Reels Algorithm

description: Airtel Rs. 449 vs. Jio Rs. 349: Postpaid subscribers in India are almost spoilt for choice when it comes to postpaid plans.Two of the biggest telecom service providers (TSPs), Airtel and Jio, offer a variety of plans at affordable price points. Such two plans are Airtel’s Rs. 449 and Jio's Rs. 349 monthly subscriptions. But which one of them offers better value for money in 2025?
title: Airtel Rs. 449 vs Jio Rs. 349: Which Postpaid Plan is Better Value for Money in 2025?

description: Realme C85 Pro is confirmed to be in development as the successor to the Realme C75 5G that was introduced in May, and it is expected to be launched soon. Ahead of its anticipated debut, hands-on images of the upcoming handset have reportedly been leaked, showcasing its design and colour options. Its rear panel bears a resemblance to its predecessor, with a vertically-aligned triple rear camera unit, housed in a raised module.
title: Realme C85 Pro Hands-On Images Reportedly Reveal Design, Colour Options Ahead of Launch

description: The Vivo X300 series is all set to go official in the global markets today (October 30), comprising X300 and X300 Pro models. The handsets were introduced in China last week as the successor to the Vivo X200 series. The brand has teased several details about the handsets, including their chipsets, in the weeks leading up to the launch. The Vivo X300 and Vivo X300 Pro are confirmed to be powered by MediaTek’s flagship Dimensity 9500 chipset.
title: Vivo X300 Series Launching Today: Know Price, Features and Specifications
